titleInfo.title: Tree Edit Distance Learning via Adaptive Symbol Embeddings

mods.abstract: This directory contains the source code corresponding to the ICML 2018 paper [Tree Edit Distance Learning via Adaptive Symbol Embeddings](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/publication/2919844). In particular, it contains the MATLAB (R) script `demo.m` which performs a metric learning experiment on the 'strings' data set described in the paper. All dependencies to run the script are also included in this distribution.
